au.com.agic.apptesting.utils

Interface SystemPropertyUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemPropertyUtilsImpl

    public interface SystemPropertyUtils
    Defines a service for working with system properties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyDependentSystemProperties()
      Some system properties are defined by external dependencies that can't be passed in directly by Web Start, so we copy them from the web start jnlp prefixed properties to the standard properties
      void copyVariableToDefaultLocation(java.lang.String name)
      Copies system properties from the javaws prefixed namespace into the default namespace
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNormalisedProperties() 
      java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name)
      Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix
      boolean getPropertyAsBoolean(java.lang.String name, boolean defaultValue)
      Gets a system property as a boolean
      float getPropertyAsFloat(java.lang.String name, float defaultValue)
      Gets a system property as a float
      int getPropertyAsInt(java.lang.String name, int defaultValue)
      Gets a system property as a int
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getPropertyAsOptional(java.lang.String name)
      Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix.
      java.lang.String getPropertyEmptyAsNull(java.lang.String name)
      Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • getNormalisedProperties

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNormalisedProperties()
        Returns:
        A list of all the system properties with web start prefixes removed

      • getProperty

        java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name)
        Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the system property
        Returns:
        The value of the system property

      • getPropertyAsBoolean

        boolean getPropertyAsBoolean(java.lang.String name,
                             boolean defaultValue)
        Gets a system property as a boolean
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property
        defaultValue - The default value if the property is empty or null
        Returns:
        the boolean value of the system property, or the default value if the system property is empty

      • getPropertyAsFloat

        float getPropertyAsFloat(java.lang.String name,
                         float defaultValue)
        Gets a system property as a float
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property
        defaultValue - The default value if the property is empty or null
        Returns:
        the boolean value of the system property, or the default value if the system property is empty

      • getPropertyAsInt

        int getPropertyAsInt(java.lang.String name,
                     int defaultValue)
        Gets a system property as a int
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property
        defaultValue - The default value if the property is empty or null
        Returns:
        the boolean value of the system property, or the default value if the system property is empty

      • getPropertyEmptyAsNull

        java.lang.String getPropertyEmptyAsNull(java.lang.String name)
        Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix. Treats empty strings as null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the system property
        Returns:
        The value of the system property

      • getPropertyAsOptional

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getPropertyAsOptional(java.lang.String name)
        Extracts system properties, either from their default name, or with the javaws prefix. Treats empty strings as empty optional.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the system property
        Returns:
        The value of the system property

      • copyVariableToDefaultLocation

        void copyVariableToDefaultLocation(java.lang.String name)
        Copies system properties from the javaws prefixed namespace into the default namespace
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the variable, excluding the javaws prefix

      • copyDependentSystemProperties

        void copyDependentSystemProperties()
        Some system properties are defined by external dependencies that can't be passed in directly by Web Start, so we copy them from the web start jnlp prefixed properties to the standard properties
